main event: On 9 August 1965, a security guard at Sioux Army Depot observed a silvery, disc-shaped craft hovering at approximately 3,000 feet.
interesting points: The object remained in view for about 15 minutes before accelerating and disappearing at a high speed., The object was reported to have no sound associated with it., Initial reports suggested the object resembled the North Star in size and was white in color., The sighting was confirmed by military personnel using binoculars., The report details other sightings in the area, including multiple objects and observations by a group of children.
witness description: A security guard and military personnel
